Maasai Mara.description: Maasai Mara National Reserve is an area of preserved savannah wilderness in southwestern Kenya, along the Tanzanian border.

Aboseli National Park.description: Natural area with abundant wildlife, including free-ranging elephants & 600 species of birds.

Lake Nakuru.description: This Rift Valley soda lake in Lake Nakuru National Park features flamingos, rhinoceroses & more.

Great Wall of China.description: Ancient world wonder that winds for more than 5,500 miles across China, with towers & walkways.

Forbidden City.description: Massive palace complex & museum featuring tours, art exhibits & restaurants.

TerracottaArmy.description: Attraction renowned for lifelike sculptures of terra-cotta warriors built around the 3rd century BC.

Colosseum.description: Monumental 3-tiered Roman amphitheater once used for gladiatorial games, with guided tour option.

Amalfi Coast.description: UNESCO-listed landscape lined with small towns precariously perched between mountains & the sea.

Florence Cathedral.description: Landmark 1200s cathedral known for its red-tiled dome, colored marble facade & elegant Giotto tower.
